title: Disguised as a Boss in an Escape Game - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Horror   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Game Elements   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Multiple Transported Individuals   Pragmatic Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Stoic Characters   Survival Game   System Administrator   Thriller   Transported into a Game World   Unlimited Flow
author: Shāng Yǔ   商雨
description:
You Xi, who was born with a smile upon his lips, kept his lips up in the death game.

Full of confidence, talented and suave. He was a mudslide of a different style in the eerie escape game, capturing the hearts of thousands of girls.

But within his heart: “Damn, what the hell is this, ah! Go away!'>
